00029 // Constant column names.
00030 #define CallColName std::wstring( L"Call")
00031 #define ScoreColName std::wstring( L"Score")
00032 #define BackgroundColName std::wstring( L"Background")
00033 #define ConfidenceColName std::wstring( L"Confidence")
00034 #define RAS1ColName std::wstring( L"RAS1")
00035 #define RAS2ColName std::wstring( L"RAS2")
00036 #define AAColName std::wstring( L"AA Call p-value")
00037 #define ABColName std::wstring( L"AB Call p-value")
00038 #define BBColName std::wstring( L"BB Call p-value")
00039 #define NoCallColName std::wstring( L"No Call p-value")
00040 #define ProbeSetNameColName std::wstring( L"Probe Set Name")
00041 #define DetectionColName std::wstring( L"Detection")
00042 #define DetectionPValueColName std::wstring( L"Detection p-value")
00043 #define SignalColName std::wstring( L"Signal")
00044 #define NumberPairsColName std::wstring( L"Number of Pairs")
00045 #define NumberPairsUsedColName std::wstring( L"Number of Pairs Used")
00046 #define ChangeColName std::wstring( L"Change")
00047 #define ChangePValueColName std::wstring( L"Change p-value")
00048 #define SignalLogRatioColName std::wstring( L"Signal Log Ratio")
00049 #define SignalLogRatioLowColName std::wstring( L"Signal Log Ratio Low")
00050 #define SignalLogRatioHighColName std::wstring( L"Signal Log Ratio High")
00051 #define CommonPairsColName std::wstring( L"Common Pairs")
00052 #define CenterXColName std::wstring( L"Center X")
00053 #define CenterYColName std::wstring( L"Center Y")
00054 #define SmoothFactorColName std::wstring( L"Smooth Factor")
00055 #define PositionColName std::wstring( L"Position")
00056 #define ReasonColName std::wstring( L"Reason")
00057 #define ForceCallColName std::wstring( L"Force Call")
00058 #define OriginalCallColName std::wstring( L"Original Call")

00061 CHPData::CHPData()
00062 {
00063         entriesExp = 0;
00064         entriesGeno = 0;
00065         entriesUniv = 0;
00066         entriesReseq = 0;
00067         bgZones = 0;
00068         forceSet = 0;
00069         origSet = 0;
00070         wideProbeSetNames = false;
00071         Clear();
00072 }
00073 
00074 CHPData::CHPData(const std::string& filename, const std::string &assayType) 
00075 { 
00076         entriesExp = 0;
00077         entriesGeno = 0;
00078         entriesUniv = 0;
00079         entriesReseq = 0;
00080         bgZones = 0;
00081         forceSet = 0;
00082         origSet = 0;
00083         wideProbeSetNames = false;
00084         Clear();
00085         SetFilename(filename);
00086 
00087         std::wstring groupName;
00088         if (assayType == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00089                 groupName = CHP_EXPR_GROUP;
00090 
00091         else if (assayType == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00092                 groupName = CHP_RESEQ_GROUP;
00093 
00094         else if (assayType == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00095                 groupName = CHP_GENO_GROUP;
00096 
00097         else if (assayType == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE)
00098                 groupName = CHP_UNIV_GROUP;
00099 
00100         else
00101                 return;
00102 
00103         DataGroupHeader dcHdr(groupName);
00104         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdr);
00105         genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId(assayType);
00106         DataGroupHeader dcHdrBg(CHP_BG_ZONE_GROUP);
00107         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdrBg);
00108 
00109         // Now add the force and orig sets for reseq designs.
00110         if (assayType == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00111         {
00112                 DataGroupHeader dcHdrForce(CHP_RESEQ_FORCE_CALL_GROUP);
00113                 genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdrForce);
00114                 DataGroupHeader dcHdrOrig(CHP_RESEQ_ORIG_CALL_GROUP);
00115                 genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdrOrig);
00116         }
00117 
00118 }
00119 
00120 void CHPData::GetEntry(int32_t row, CHPGenotypeEntry& e)
00121 {
00122         PrepareGenoEntryDataSet();
00123         if (entriesGeno && entriesGeno->IsOpen())
00124         {
00125                 std::string probeSetName;
00126                 if (wideProbeSetNames == false)
00127                         entriesGeno->GetData(row, 0, probeSetName);
00128                 else
00129                 {
00130                         std::wstring wprobeSetName;
00131                         entriesGeno->GetData(row, 0, wprobeSetName);
00132                         probeSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(wprobeSetName);
00133                 }
00134                 e.SetProbeSetName(probeSetName);
00135 
00136                 u_int8_t call = 0;
00137                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 1, call);
00138                 e.SetCall(call);
00139 
00140                 float confidence = 0.0;
00141                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 2, confidence);
00142                 e.SetConfidence(confidence);
00143 
00144                 float ras1 = 0.0;
00145                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 3, ras1);
00146                 e.SetRAS1(ras1);
00147 
00148                 float ras2 = 0.0;
00149                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 4, ras2);
00150                 e.SetRAS2(ras2);
00151 
00152                 float aaCall = 0.0;
00153                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 5, aaCall);
00154                 e.SetAACall(aaCall);
00155 
00156                 float abCall = 0.0;
00157                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 6, abCall);
00158                 e.SetABCall(abCall);
00159 
00160                 float bbCall = 0.0;
00161                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 7, bbCall);
00162                 e.SetBBCall(bbCall);
00163 
00164                 float noCall = 0.0;
00165                 entriesGeno->GetData(row, 8, noCall);
00166                 e.SetNoCall(noCall);
00167         }
00168 }
00169 
00170 void CHPData::GetEntry(int32_t row, CHPExpressionEntry& e)
00171 {
00172         PrepareExprEntryDataSet();
00173         if (entriesExp && entriesExp->IsOpen())
00174         {
00175                 int colIndex = 0;
00176                 std::string probeSetName;
00177                 if (wideProbeSetNames == false)
00178                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, probeSetName);
00179                 else
00180                 {
00181                         std::wstring wprobeSetName;
00182                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, wprobeSetName);
00183                         probeSetName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(wprobeSetName);
00184                 }
00185                 e.SetProbeSetName(probeSetName);
00186 
00187                 u_int8_t detection = 0;
00188                 entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, detection);
00189                 e.SetDetection(detection);
00190 
00191                 float detectionPValue = 0.0;
00192                 entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, detectionPValue);
00193                 e.SetDetectionPValue(detectionPValue);
00194 
00195                 float signal = 0.0;
00196                 entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, signal);
00197                 e.SetSignal(signal);
00198 
00199                 u_int16_t numPairs = 0;
00200                 entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, numPairs);
00201                 e.SetNumPairs(numPairs);
00202 
00203                 u_int16_t numPairsUsed = 0;
00204                 entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, numPairsUsed);
00205                 e.SetNumPairsUsed(numPairsUsed);
00206 
00207                 e.SetHasComparisonData(false);
00208 
00209                 if (entriesExp->Cols() > colIndex)
00210                 {
00211                         e.SetHasComparisonData(true);
00212 
00213                         u_int8_t change = 0;
00214                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, change);
00215                         e.SetChange(change);
00216 
00217                         float changePValue = 0.0;
00218                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, changePValue);
00219                         e.SetChangePValue(changePValue);
00220 
00221                         float sigLogRatio = 0.0;
00222                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, sigLogRatio);
00223                         e.SetSigLogRatio(sigLogRatio);
00224 
00225                         float sigLogRatioLo = 0.0;
00226                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, sigLogRatioLo);
00227                         e.SetSigLogRatioLo(sigLogRatioLo);
00228 
00229                         float sigLogRatioHi = 0.0;
00230                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, sigLogRatioHi);
00231                         e.SetSigLogRatioHi(sigLogRatioHi);
00232 
00233                         u_int16_t commonPairs = 0;
00234                         entriesExp->GetData(row, colIndex++, commonPairs);
00235                         e.SetCommonPairs(commonPairs);
00236                 }
00237         }
00238 }

00240 void CHPData::GetEntry(int32_t row, CHPUniversalEntry& e)
00241 {
00242         PrepareUnivEntryDataSet();
00243         if (entriesUniv && entriesUniv->IsOpen())
00244         {
00245                 float background = 0.0;
00246                 entriesUniv->GetData(row, 0, background);
00247                 e.SetBackground(background);
00248         }
00249 }

00251 void CHPData::GetEntry(int32_t row, CHPReseqEntry& e)
00252 {
00253         PrepareReseqEntryDataSet();
00254         if (entriesReseq && entriesReseq->IsOpen())
00255         {
00256                 int8_t call;
00257                 entriesReseq->GetData(row, 0, call);
00258                 e.call=call;
00259                 entriesReseq->GetData(row, 1, e.score);
00260         }
00261 }
00262 
00263 void CHPData::PrepareGenoEntryDataSet()
00264 {
00265         if (entriesGeno == 0)
00266         {
00267                 entriesGeno = genericData.DataSet(CHP_GENO_GROUP, CHP_GENO_GROUP);
00268                 if (entriesGeno)
00269                 {
00270                         entriesGeno->Open();
00271                         wideProbeSetNames = (entriesGeno->Header().GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UnicodeCharColType);
00272                 }
00273         }
00274 }
00275 
00276 void CHPData::PrepareExprEntryDataSet()
00277 {
00278         if (entriesExp == 0)
00279         {
00280                 entriesExp = genericData.DataSet(CHP_EXPR_GROUP, CHP_EXPR_GROUP);
00281                 if (entriesExp)
00282                 {
00283                         entriesExp->Open();
00284                         wideProbeSetNames = (entriesExp->Header().GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UnicodeCharColType);
00285                 }
00286         }
00287 }
00288 
00289 void CHPData::PrepareUnivEntryDataSet()
00290 {
00291         if (entriesUniv == 0)
00292         {
00293                 entriesUniv = genericData.DataSet(CHP_UNIV_GROUP, CHP_UNIV_GROUP);
00294                 if (entriesUniv)
00295                 {
00296                         entriesUniv->Open();
00297                 }
00298         }
00299 }

00301 void CHPData::PrepareReseqEntryDataSet()
00302 {
00303         if (entriesReseq == 0)
00304         {
00305                 entriesReseq = genericData.DataSet(CHP_RESEQ_GROUP, CHP_RESEQ_GROUP);
00306                 if (entriesReseq)
00307                 {
00308                         entriesReseq->Open();
00309                 }
00310         }
00311 }
00312 
00313 void CHPData::AddColumns(DataSetHeader& hdr, bool hasCompData)
00314 {
00315         if(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId() == CHP_EXPRESSION_ASSAY_TYPE)
00316                 AddExprColumns(hdr, hasCompData);
00317 
00318         if(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId() == CHP_GENOTYPING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00319                 AddGenoColumns(hdr);
00320 
00321         else if(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId() == CHP_UNIVERSAL_ASSAY_TYPE)
00322                 AddUnivColumns(hdr);
00323 
00324         else if(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId() == CHP_RESEQUENCING_ASSAY_TYPE)
00325                 AddReseqColumns(hdr);
00326 }
00327 
00328 void CHPData::AddReseqColumns(DataSetHeader& hdr)
00329 {
00330         hdr.SetName(CHP_RESEQ_GROUP);
00331         //call - char
00332         hdr.AddByteColumn(CallColName);
00333         //Score - float
00334         hdr.AddFloatColumn(ScoreColName);
00335 }
00336 
00337 void CHPData::AddUnivColumns(DataSetHeader& hdr)
00338 {
00339         hdr.SetName(CHP_UNIV_GROUP);
00340         //Background - float
00341         hdr.AddFloatColumn(BackgroundColName);
00342 }
00343 
00344 void CHPData::AddGenoColumns(DataSetHeader& hdr)
00345 {
00346         hdr.SetName(CHP_GENO_GROUP);
00347         //Probeset name - string
00348         hdr.AddAsciiColumn(ProbeSetNameColName, maxProbeSetName);
00349         //Call - unsigned char
00350         hdr.AddUByteColumn(CallColName);
00351         //Confidence - float
00352         hdr.AddFloatColumn(ConfidenceColName);
00353         //RAS1 - float
00354         hdr.AddFloatColumn(RAS1ColName);
00355         //RAS2 - float
00356         hdr.AddFloatColumn(RAS2ColName);
00357         //AA Call - float
00358         hdr.AddFloatColumn(AAColName);
00359         //AB Call - float
00360         hdr.AddFloatColumn(ABColName);
00361         //BB Call - float
00362         hdr.AddFloatColumn(BBColName);
00363         //No Call - float
00364         hdr.AddFloatColumn(NoCallColName);
00365 }
00366 
00367 void CHPData::AddExprColumns(DataSetHeader& hdr, bool hasCompData)
00368 {
00369         hdr.SetName(CHP_EXPR_GROUP);
00370         //Probeset name - string
00371         hdr.AddAsciiColumn(ProbeSetNameColName, maxProbeSetName);
00372         //Detection - unsigned char
00373         hdr.AddUByteColumn(DetectionColName);
00374         //Detection p-value - float
00375         hdr.AddFloatColumn(DetectionPValueColName);
00376         //Signal - float
00377         hdr.AddFloatColumn(SignalColName);
00378         //Number of pairs - unsigned short
00379         hdr.AddUShortColumn(NumberPairsColName);
00380         //Number of pairs used - unsigned short
00381         hdr.AddUShortColumn(NumberPairsUsedColName);
00382 
00383         if (hasCompData == true)
00384         {
00385                 //Change - unsigned char
00386                 hdr.AddUByteColumn(ChangeColName);
00387                 //Change p-value - float
00388                 hdr.AddFloatColumn(ChangePValueColName);
00389                 //Signal Log Ratio - float
00390                 hdr.AddFloatColumn(SignalLogRatioColName);
00391                 //Signal Log Ratio Low - float
00392                 hdr.AddFloatColumn(SignalLogRatioLowColName);
00393                 //Signal Log Ratio High - float
00394                 hdr.AddFloatColumn(SignalLogRatioHighColName);
00395                 //Common Pairs - unsigned short
00396                 hdr.AddUShortColumn(CommonPairsColName);
00397         }
00398 }

00406 void CHPData::GetBackgroundZones(int32_t row, int32_t rowCnt, CHPBackgroundZoneVector& zones)
00407 {
00408         CHPBackgroundZone z;
00409         for(int i = row; i < rowCnt; i++)
00410         {
00411                 GetBackgroundZone(i, z);
00412                 zones.push_back(z);
00413                 z.Clear();
00414         }
00415 }
00416 
00417 void CHPData::GetBackgroundZone(int32_t row, CHPBackgroundZone& zone)
00418 {
00419         PrepareBackgroundZoneDataSet();
00420         if (bgZones && bgZones->IsOpen())
00421         {
00422                 float centerX = 0.0;
00423                 bgZones->GetData(row, 0, centerX);
00424                 zone.SetCenterX(centerX);
00425 
00426                 float centerY = 0.0;
00427                 bgZones->GetData(row, 1, centerY);
00428                 zone.SetCenterY(centerY);
00429 
00430                 float background = 0.0;
00431                 bgZones->GetData(row, 2, background);
00432                 zone.SetBackground(background);
00433 
00434                 float smoothFactor = 0.0;
00435                 bgZones->GetData(row, 3, smoothFactor);
00436                 zone.SetSmoothFactor(smoothFactor);
00437         }
00438 }
00439 
00440 void CHPData::GetForceCall(int32_t row, CHPReseqForceCall& force)
00441 {
00442         PrepareForceDataSet();
00443         if (forceSet && forceSet->IsOpen())
00444         {
00445                 forceSet->GetData(row, 0, force.position);
00446                 int8_t value;
00447                 forceSet->GetData(row, 1, value);
00448                 force.call = value;
00449                 forceSet->GetData(row, 2, value);
00450                 force.reason = value;
00451         }
00452 }
00453 
00454 void CHPData::GetOrigCall(int32_t row, CHPReseqOrigCall &orig)
00455 {
00456         PrepareOrigDataSet();
00457         if (origSet && origSet->IsOpen())
00458         {
00459                 origSet->GetData(row, 0, orig.position);
00460                 int8_t value;
00461                 origSet->GetData(row, 1, value);
00462                 orig.call = value;
00463         }
00464 }

00466 CHPData::~CHPData() 
00467 { 
00468         Clear(); 
00469 }
00470 
00471 void CHPData::Clear()
00472 {
00473         if (entriesGeno){ entriesGeno->Delete();  entriesGeno = 0; }
00474         if (entriesExp){ entriesExp->Delete();  entriesExp = 0; }
00475         if (entriesUniv){ entriesUniv->Delete();  entriesUniv = 0; }
00476         if (entriesReseq){ entriesReseq->Delete();  entriesReseq = 0; }
00477         if (bgZones){ bgZones->Delete();  bgZones = 0; }
00478         if (forceSet) { forceSet->Delete(); forceSet = 0; }
00479         if (origSet) { origSet->Delete(); origSet = 0; }
00480         genericData.Header().Clear();
00481         cachedRows = -1;
00482         cachedCols = -1;
00483 }

00487         genericData.Header().SetFilename(p);
00488 }

00505 int32_t CHPData::GetEntryCount()
00506 {
00507         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00508         DataSetHeader dpHdr = dcHdr->GetDataSet(0);
00509         return dpHdr.GetRowCnt();
00510 }
00511 
00512 void CHPData::SetEntryCount(int32_t ln, int32_t maxln, bool hasCompData)
00513 {
00514         maxProbeSetName = maxln;
00515         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00516         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(ln);
00517         AddColumns(dpHdr, hasCompData);
00518         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00519         dcHdr->AddDataSetHdr(dpHdr);
00520 }

00529 void CHPData::SetBackgroundZoneCnt(int32_t ln)
00530 {
00531         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00532         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(ln);
00533         dpHdr.SetName(CHP_BG_ZONE_GROUP);
00534 
00535         //center X coord - float
00536         dpHdr.AddFloatColumn(CenterXColName);
00537         //center Y coord - float
00538         dpHdr.AddFloatColumn(CenterYColName);
00539         //background - float
00540         dpHdr.AddFloatColumn(BackgroundColName);
00541         //smoothing factor - float
00542         dpHdr.AddFloatColumn(SmoothFactorColName);
00543 
00544         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(1);
00545         dcHdr->AddDataSetHdr(dpHdr);
00546 }

00555 void CHPData::SetForceCnt(int32_t ln)
00556 {
00557         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00558         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(ln);
00559         dpHdr.SetName(CHP_RESEQ_FORCE_CALL_GROUP);
00560 
00561         //position - int
00562         dpHdr.AddIntColumn(PositionColName);
00563         //call - byte
00564         dpHdr.AddByteColumn(ForceCallColName);
00565         //reason - byte
00566         dpHdr.AddByteColumn(ReasonColName);
00567 
00568         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(2);
00569         dcHdr->AddDataSetHdr(dpHdr);
00570 }

00637 }

00644 ParameterNameValueType CHPData::GetAlgParam(const std::wstring& tag)
00645 {
00646         std::wstring name = ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX_S + tag;
00647         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00648     GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00649     hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType);
00650         ParameterNameValueType type = paramType;
00651         type.SetName(tag);
00652         return type;
00653 }

00665 
00666 ParameterNameValueTypeVector CHPData::GetAlgParams()
00667 {
00668         ParameterNameValueTypeVector nvt;
00669         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00670         ParameterNameValueType param;
00671 
00672         genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00673         while(begin != end)
00674         {
00675                 std::wstring key = begin->GetName();
00676                 if(key.compare(0, ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX_S.size(),ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX_S) == 0)
00677                 {
00678                         param = *begin;
00679                         key.erase(0, ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX_S.size());
00680                         param.SetName(key);
00681                         nvt.push_back(param);
00682                 }
00683                 begin++;
00684         }
00685         return nvt;
00686 }
00687

00706 ParameterNameValueTypeVector CHPData::GetChipSums()
00707 {
00708         ParameterNameValueTypeVector nvt;
00709         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin, end;
00710         ParameterNameValueType param;
00711 
00712         genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00713         while(begin != end)
00714         {
00715                 std::wstring key = begin->GetName();
00716                 if(key.compare(0, CHIP_SUMMARY_PARAMETER_NAME_PREFIX_S.size(),CHIP_SUMMARY_PARAMETER_NAME_PREFIX_S) == 0)
00717                 {
00718                         param = *begin;
00719                         key.erase(0, CHIP_SUMMARY_PARAMETER_NAME_PREFIX_S.size());
00720                         param.SetName(key);
00721                         nvt.push_back(param);
00722                 }
00723                 begin++;
00724         }
00725         return nvt;
00726 }

00772 std::wstring CHPData::GetWStringFromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00773 {
00774         std::wstring result;
00775         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00776         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00777         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00778         {
00779                 result = paramType.GetValueText();
00780         }
00781         return result;
00782 }
00783 
00784 void CHPData::SetWStringToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, const std::wstring value, int32_t reserve)
00785 {
00786         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00787         paramType.SetName(name);
00788         paramType.SetValueText(value, reserve);
00789         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00790         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00791 }
00792 
00793 int32_t CHPData::GetInt32FromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00794 {
00795         int32_t result = 0;
00796         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00797         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00798         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00799         {
00800                 result = paramType.GetValueInt32();
00801         }
00802         return result;
00803 }
00804 
00805 void CHPData::SetInt32ToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, int32_t value)
00806 {
00807         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00808         paramType.SetName(name);
00809         paramType.SetValueInt32(value);
00810         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00811         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00812 }

00814 void CHPData::SetFloatToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, float value)
00815 {
00816         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00817         paramType.SetName(name);
00818         paramType.SetValueFloat(value);
00819         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00820         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00821 }

00823 void CHPData::PrepareBackgroundZoneDataSet()
00824 {
00825         if (bgZones == 0)
00826         {
00827                 bgZones = genericData.DataSet(CHP_BG_ZONE_GROUP, CHP_BG_ZONE_GROUP);
00828                 if (bgZones)
00829                 {
00830                         bgZones->Open();
00831                 }
00832         }
00833 }

00843                 }
